title: Statement by the President on Central African Republic National Day | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
December 01, 2009

 



Statement by the President on Central African Republic National Day




On behalf of the American people, I extend my best wishes to all those who are celebrating the National Day of the Central African Republic.  Our Nation stands with the Central African Republic as both our countries work together to promote peace and prosperity.
